zone.line: Left have I field & pasture
Which a deep night involves
With presageful holy fear
In us the better spirit wakes.
Asleep are now the strage feelings
With these furious actions;
Is moved now Humanity
The love of God moves itself now
Be quiet Dog! run not here & there
At the threshold what smellest thou here
Lay thee behind the oven there,
My best give I to thee!
?It As you abroad on the mountain paths
Through running & springing amused us hast,
So never now ?still of me the care
As a welcome still guest
But if in our narrow cell
The lamp friendly freshly burns
Then will in our bosoms clear
themselves
In hearts, that itself knows
